scripts.test: npm run cp-local-env && hardhat typechain && hardhat test
scripts.test-locking: npm run cp-local-env && hardhat typechain && hardhat test ./test/TokenLocking.test.ts
scripts.deploy:token:local: npm run clean && hardhat run --network local   ./scripts/deploy-token.ts
scripts.deploy:tokenlock:local: npm run clean && hardhat run --network local   ./scripts/deploy-tokenlock.ts
scripts.deploy:lazyPoolLock:local: npm run clean && hardhat run --network local   ./scripts/deploy-lazy-pool-lock.ts
scripts.deploy:lazyPoolLock:mumbai: npm run clean && hardhat run --network mumbai   ./scripts/deploy-lazy-pool-lock.ts
scripts.deploy:lazyPoolLockRewardDistributor:mum: npm run clean && hardhat run --network mumbai   ./scripts/deploy-distribute-lazyPool-reward.ts
scripts.deploy:token:rinkeby: npm run clean && hardhat run --network rinkeby ./scripts/deploy-token.ts
scripts.deploy:token:goerli: npm run clean && hardhat run --network goerli  ./scripts/deploy-token.ts
scripts.deploy:token:mumbai: npm run clean && hardhat run --network mumbai  ./scripts/deploy-token.ts
scripts.deploy:token:mainnet: npm run clean && hardhat run --network mainnet ./scripts/deploy-token.ts
